医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
西奈山研究人员确定了一种特殊红细胞转运蛋白的结构西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员已经确定了红细胞中发现的特殊转运蛋白的结构及其与药物的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Mount-Sinai-researchers-identify-the-struct-of-a-special-red-blood-cell-transporter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Mount-Sinai-researchers-identify-the-struct-of-a-special-red-blood-cell-transporter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=debd11af-4abc-4a6b-b161-e9c03904d1a9 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:58:00 -0400 Mount Sinai researchers identify the structure of a special red blood cell transporter
研究表明性行为如何随着年龄而变化今天发表的一项新研究表明，随着年龄的增长，我们的性伴侣数量会发生变化，并且有一些令人惊讶的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Study-shows-how- Sex-behaviors-change-with-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Study-shows-how- Sex-behaviors-change-with-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=612b8b4c-81fc-4e1b-8193-b659fd875a6f Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:52:00 -0400 Study shows how sexual behaviors change with age
临床前研究为首次临床膀胱移植做准备提供了重要的第一步据美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊 The Journal of Urology® 10 月号报道，一系列临床前研究为开发人类机器人膀胱移植技术迈出了重要的第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Bladder-Transplantation-In-Humans-Initial-Studies-To-Develop-Technique.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Bladder-Transplantation-In-Humans-Initial-Studies-To-Develop-Technique.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96a2b45c-46b0-430a-b9ec-0de0b97386dd Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:47:00 -0400 Pre-clinical studies provide important first steps to prepare for first clinical bladder transplant
使用生物电子设备捕获和释放肿瘤细胞在题为《癌症诊断微流体系统》的书中，UPV/EHU 的微流体集群小组描述了构建生物电子设备的过程，该设备由涂有智能聚合物的金电极组成，能够以非侵入性、可控的方式捕获和释放细胞，同时进行监测使用传统电气测量的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Capture-and-release-of-tumor-cells-using-a-bioelectric-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Capture-and-release-of-tumor-cells-using-a-bioelectric-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=466812ef-a839-4345-90a1-00623982ecb5 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:32:42 -0400 Capture and release of tumor cells using a bioelectronic device
研究显示，妊娠期糖尿病之后的 2 型糖尿病存在严重的种族和民族不平等哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼学院流行病学副教授、流行病学家 Teresa Janevic 博士的一项新研究表明，妊娠期糖尿病后，糖尿病中的种​​族和族裔不平等现象已经确立，但这些不平等现象相当严重，并且一直是孕产妇健康公平性中被忽视的一个方面。公共卫生。迄今为止，关于妊娠期糖尿病 (GDM) 后 2 型糖尿病的种族和民族差异的研究还很有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Racial-and-ethnic-inequities-are-substantial-in-type-2-diabetes-after-gestational-diabetes-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Racial-and-ethnic-inequities-are-substantial-in-type-2-diabetes-after-gestational-diabetes-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a787a51-b926-4972-9b1c-caa66da02d48 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:28:00 -0400 Racial and ethnic inequities are substantial in type 2 diabetes after gestational diabetes, study shows
FAU 研究人员发现了识别治疗药物成瘾的新方法根据药物滥用和心理健康服务管理局的数据，2020 年美国约有 4000 万人患有药物滥用障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/FAU-researchers-discover-novel-method-to-identify-therapeutic-agents-to-treat-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/FAU-researchers-discover-novel-method-to-identify-therapeutic-agents-to-treat-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5708821-6988-41c2-b966-ffe3d034363d Fri, 08 Sep 2023 14:40:00 -0400 FAU researchers discover novel method to identify therapeutic agents to treat addiction
NCCN 发布新指南，重点关注预防和治疗癌症相关血栓美国国家综合癌症网络今天宣布发布新的支持性护理患者指南，重点关注预防和治疗癌症相关血栓，也称为静脉血栓栓塞 (VTE)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/NCCN-publishes-new-guideline-focused-on-preventing-and-treating-cancer-linked-blood-clots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/NCCN-publishes-new-guideline-focused-on-preventing-and-treating-cancer-linked-blood-clots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38dac415-fbcc-4953-956b-34abf5232cea Fri, 08 Sep 2023 14:29:00 -0400 NCCN publishes new guideline focused on preventing and treating cancer-associated blood clots
新型卫生产品增强了手部抵抗接触感染的天然屏障接触感染是细菌和病毒等病原体从一个人传播到另一个人的最常见方式之一。洗手和消毒是重要的卫生习惯，可以最大限度地减少感染传染病的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/New-hygiene-product-boosts-natural-hand-barrier-against-contact-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/New-hygiene-product-boosts-natural-hand-barrier-against-contact-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f95735b7-8d16-4a64-9f28-1f94c8edb019 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 14:22:00 -0400 New hygiene product boosts natural hand barrier against contact infection
用于制造生物工程血管模型的3D生物打印方法全南国立大学科学家的一篇评论论文总结了用于制造生物工程血管模型的生物打印方法的最新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/3D-bioprinting-methods-for-fabricating-bioengineered-blood-vessel-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/3D-bioprinting-methods-for-fabricating-bioengineered-blood-vessel-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ed8199d-063c-418a-8f49-781b9cc27e52 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 14:09:00 -0400 3D bioprinting methods for fabricating bioengineered blood vessel models
有史以来最大规模的研究调查了随机“全天候”血糖水平的遗传学今天发表在《自然遗传学》上的突破性研究描述了有史以来最大规模的随机“全天候”血糖水平遗传学研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Largest-ever-study-looks-into-the-genics-of-random-round-the-clock-blood-glucose-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Largest-ever-study-looks-into-the-genics-of-random-round-the-clock-blood-glucose-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18d033b2-1fb2-467c-9b9e-70fe9d208eab Fri, 08 Sep 2023 14:03:00 -0400 Largest-ever study looks into the genetics of random "round-the-clock" blood glucose levels
